features: 【FAST CLEAN QUICK DRY】: By the automatic makeup brush cleaner, No need to clean it by hands ,just take several seconds for a thorough clean and dry with our premium Electric Makeup Brush Cleaner and Dryer. It’s recommended to clean makeup brushes once every two to four weeks.

【8 Rubber Collars Suit For Most of Brushes Size】 - 8 different specially customized rubber collars ((3mm, 5mm, 7mm, 10mm,15mm,18mm,24mm,30mm) to fit different brushes, widely compatible with 95% make-up brushes in the market Note: Please you'd better to use it with a cleaning solution to achieve a clean effect.

【TO Make Healthy Skin】: This makup brush cleaner machine can help effectively clean cosmetics, chemicals and other things on makeup brushes which are harmful for your skin. Don't need to worry about skin issues any more. Its fast drying function is helpful to keep your brushes soft, clean and durable.

【EASY TO USE】: Portable One-Button design is convenient for cleaning and drying, just 3 steps easily to use this electric make up cleaner and dryer. 1.Attach the brush to the spinner. 2.Pour water and soap into the bowl. 3.Dip & spin to clean, raise & spin to dry. Needs 2 AAA high quality batteries to operate (NOT Included), please see the 7 th picture on the item description page to follow the item using step.

【WARRANTY&SUPPORT】Any problems or inquiries, please Contact Us freely. Please read the instructions carefully before use and use the product according to the instructions. This makes a great birthday present, holiday gift, or anniversary gift. Also wonderful for friends, family, and co-workers.
body.description: How to Clean and Dry Your Makeup Brush? 8 * flexible brush collars1. Put 1/3 water and some makeup brush fluid into the bowl. 2. Select the suitable collars and insert the brush into the spinner. 3.Dip and dunk the brush in the liquid. 4.Turn on the spinner, spin the brush to clean 5-10s. 5.With clear water and clean again. 6.Spin the brush to dry it about 5-10s 1. Please mounting spindle tightly, choosing the right and slightly tight silicone sleeve before using. 2. Please use the new battery for washing well and longer use,since the resistance of brush is great in the water,which may affect the makeup brush cleaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works! Saves $$$ on cleaning product
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for two reasons1. To get brushes cleaner and dryer, faster.2. To save on brush cleaning product. (Some reviews complain that this didn't clean their non-water soluble make-up brushes when using water. Sigh. Of course not, if makeup was waterproof, it's not going to get clean using just water. The problem isn't the spinner, it's user error....When cleaning manually, my brushes soak up the cleaner (Garnier Micellar Water- (MW) pink top) and I wasted a lot, and got only moderately clean brushes, and they needed at least a day to dry. What I did today, using the same MW product, got 2 dozen brushes nearly new condition, very dry. I'll never be without this spinner. After putting the brush holder on a brush, pulling off, putting on again for step two, I set up an assembly line.1. Small bowl with Micellar water (MW)2. Brush Cleaning bowl3. MW in the bowl that comes with kit4. Wide mouth Mason jar with dawn and water5. Wide mouth Mason jar with regular waterAs the first bowl of MW got dirty, I'd use some of the MW from the spinning bowl to replace it, and topped of the spinning bowl with fresh MW. This saved product, and got max use out of the MW.You will also need AAA batteries, and probably gorilla glue or super glue, as in my experience a few brushes pulled off from the handles since they weren't glued well to start with. It has nothing to do with the spinner.By starting with MW, it really didn't matter if the makeup was water soluble or not. Everything came out clean. I cleaned my wedges with with the MC that was in the bowl when I was finished cleaning the brushes, then used the dawn and the regular water jars, so all my applicators are clean now! Absolutely nothing wasted. This spinner will pay for itself in two uses just from the savings on MW. If you use pricier brush cleaner, it will save you even more $$ faster.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing! My brushes have never been cleaner since I bought them!
reviews.reviewText: Ok soooo I'm not a big makeup person but I recently started wearing foundation because I realized that I’m 31 years old and my skin tone is uneven. Since I’ve started wearing makeup I have not cleaned my brushes as consistently as I should because my biggest annoyance was cleaning them and having them dry for a day or two depending on how thick the brush was.So when I was at the store and I saw a makeup cleaner like this one for 40$ I was tempted to buy it because of how easy it looked and it promised the brushes being instantly dry. But I didn’t want to pay 40$… thankfully Amazon exists and I hopped on here and found almost the same exact one for waaaay cheaper. Half the cost.I used it just now for my foundation brushes that reaaaaallly needed it as you can tell from the pictures and omg…. They are soo clean! I forgot that the tip of the brushes were actually silver like that. I had to go through two rounds though because my brushes be dirty. But the second bath cleaned them completely.AND the best part? I can use them right away if I needed too! They are completely dry and now my foundation goes on so much smoother :3 this is a must have for anyone who wears makeup. The process is so satisfying to watch as your brushes come out perfectly clean. after seeing what the bowl looked like after the cleaning it reminded me of how I take my coffee :P

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worked very well
reviews.reviewText: Cleaned 2 really used makeup brushes in one go with a little EcoTools cleaner in the water. Was cleaned quickly and dried nicely. The one thing we don't like is the games played with the price. It can vary +-$15 dollars every single day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleans brushes throughly
reviews.reviewText: Cleaned all of her brushes and of various sizes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I'm not mad, I'm just disappointed
reviews.reviewText: First off, I bought this product expecting it to be new, but it was clearly a returned item. It had a broken piece of eyeliner inside the box and smudgey eyeliner finger prints on the instruction manual. Everything else was still in plastic and clean, so I'm gonna let that slide. Just beware.I cleaned all of my makeup brushes, big, small, flat, round, angled, all the shapes!At first I followed the instructions exactly but the brushes barely got clean. It spins extremely slowly when even the tip of the brush touches the water. I ended up using a cleaning mat then just used this product to dry the brushes.For my bigger fluffy brushes, this was amazing for drying! Not 100% dry but a lot dryer than I could do with a towel without damaging anything.As the brushes got smaller, the device started wobbling more to the point where it wasn't really doing much in the way of drying anything.For flat brushes of all sizes, it didn't really do much either.I am not completely unhappy that I got this since it works well to dry my big brushes , which usually takes a day or two (compared to the small ones which dry quick anyway), but it just isn't as good as I wanted it to be. If the spinny device was a bit more powerful and sturdy, this product would be a hit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great at getting even the most neglected brushes clean!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I hardly ever leave reviews, but this product is worth it. My brushes have been neglected for awhile and are several years old, so I purchased this based on the reviews. Because my brushes were so gross, I sprayed each one with Dawn power wash and let it sit for a few seconds, then used Dawn liquid soap in the container before putting in medium temp water. Each brush has been restored. The entire process for 14 brushes took about 20 minutes, but I think if I do this regularly, it'd take about 15 seconds per brush. Super simple set up and I am happy with the results!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Did not work as expected
reviews.reviewText: I was expecting more from this product. It didn’t clean my brush at all. I first tried it with a gentle soap, that didn’t work. I then went and bought a brush cleanser, that didn’t work either. Using a spray brush cleanser and a towel cleaned the brush 100% times better. One thing that was good about it is that it offered attachments for multiple size brushes and the spin on it was strong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Definitely recommend it, It works great and it comes with every single brush size you can imagine...

Bought this on a whim, and out of sheer laziness with washing my brushes. It's a little flimsy, but it cleans my brushes really well, and a lot quicker than I can. Most of the older makeup came off quite quickly, while a few needed a couple extra minutes spinning in the cleaner solution. Definitely love how dry they are when it's done, and saves me so much time!
Cadeau, qu'elle a aimé.Demande beaucoup de produit,sûrement pcq elle n'avais jamais laver ses pinceaux.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works great! No more hours washing and drying!
reviews.reviewText: This works like a charm, no more hours scrubbing all of my brushes by hand on a mat and waiting hours for them to dry. I only needed to scrub the odd one, and only hung up my fat and fluffy brushes, the rest were pretty much dry after a good air twirl.
Completely destroyed my brushes. Do not buy! All brushes are frayed and bristles are now falling off. These were expensive & new makeup brushes.
